Meridian.Idaho College of Osteopathic Medicine: The proposed Idaho College of Osteopathic Medicine (ICOM) will be a freestanding, privately funded, separately licensed and independently operated entity located at ISU - Meridian Health Science Center. The school will be independent of ISU, but ISU will have representation on the school’s board of trustees. Initial capital investment in the ICOM project will be approximately $120 million.
